title: Banned account
body: Any way to get myself unbanned? carried on like a fruit loop, would love me account back plain and simple if not im doomed :p i got a lvl 29 account aswell but nothing like that account, i've learnt that doing the flame shit only makes people play worse anyways, i legitimately got angry only cause i tried to help everyone out and advance there gameplay as much as i could not in a pushy way but some people would completely disregard and be fools and id bite back like a looney tune. please unban my account haha

replies.body: Your best bet at getting an account unbanned is by submitting a ticket to appeal via [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). Keep in mind, they will only revoke the ban if they determine it was made in error, and that their decision will be final.
Thanks heaps man i greatly appreciate it, ill let you know how i go
